title: Walk through the Bible series
author: joshualinog
excerpt: - me walking through wooded areas behind the house  - primarily shorts  - using the repeated phrase what is the bible really saying here       - something to the effect that God, the Bible is really t
content:
- me walking through wooded areas behind the house 
- primarily shorts 
- using the repeated phrase what is the bible really saying here 
     - something to the effect that God, the Bible is really trying to say something to you here. Saying this in an encouraging way that reflects the love that is ready to receive them.**?**
- keying in or focusing on single verse or a couple verses 
- especially pet verses and ingrained cultural ideas 
- mainly just talking at 3 minute interval total 
- Walk through the Bible insignia underneath at the bottom 
- the verse reference at the top 
- possibly in future videos a link to longer videos related
